responsibilities: Work with business stakeholders to understand their goals, challenges, and decisions
Assist with building solutions that standardize our data approach to common problems across the company
Incorporate observability and testing best practices into projects
Assist in the development of processes to ensure our data is trusted and well-documented
Effectively work with data analysts on refining the data model used for reporting and analytical purposes
Improve availability and consistency of data points crucial for analysis
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on understanding business goals, standardizing data approaches, incorporating observability and testing, developing trusted data processes, refining data models, and improving data availability. These responsibilities are centered around data management and analysis rather than training or fine-tuning language models. There is no mention of tasks related to customizing language models for domain-specific tasks, which is the focus of this Activity.
